localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
blogPost.body: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
blogPost.title: Finley - Put your debt capital management on autopilot
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Finley简化了债务资本筹集和管理。我们的软件帮助成长中的公司自动进行尽职调查，确保合规性，并简化与资本提供者的持续报告。
localize.tagline: 让您的债务资本管理进入自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Finley簡化了債務資本籌集和管理。我們的軟件幫助成長中的公司自動進行盡職調查，確保合規性，並簡化與資本提供者的持續報告。
localize.tagline: 讓您的債務資本管理進入自動駕駛狀態

previous.excerpt: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
previous.title: Yada - Never rewrite anything again

localize.description: Yada是一个集头脑风暴、编辑和展示你的想法于一身的解决方案。从编写你的文档开始，选择如何呈现你的内容与视图。以任何顺序和任何时间对内容或视图进行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重写任何东西了

localize.description: Yada是一個集頭腦風暴、編輯和展示你的想法於一身的解決方案。從編寫你的文檔開始，選擇如何呈現你的內容與視圖。以任何順序和任何時間對內容或視圖進行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重寫任何東西了

next.excerpt: Jel is the video game for work. Jel is a collaboration tool designed for teams who also play games. Speak naturally as avatars, without using your camera. Jel is the always-on video game you can use all day with your team to hang out or get stuff done.
next.title: Jel - The video game for work.

localize.description: 杰尔是工作的电子游戏。Jel是一款为同样玩游戏的团队设计的协作工具。作为虚拟人物自然地说话，而不使用你的相机。Jel是一款永远在线的视频游戏，你可以和你的团队一起使用一整天来闲逛或完成事情。
傑爾是工作的電子遊戲。Jel是一款爲同樣玩遊戲的團隊設計的協作工具。作爲虛擬人物自然地說話，而不使用你的相機。Jel是一款永遠在線的視頻遊戲，你可以和你的團隊一起使用一整天來閒逛或完成事情。
